channel.title: CVE Feed for Logitech -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Logitech -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-0916|2024-09-17T02:26:48.928Z -- logitech -- options
item.description: An issue was discovered in Logitech Options. The OAuth 2.0 state parameter was not properly validated. This leaves applications vulnerable to CSRF attacks during authentication and authorization operations.

item.title: CVE-2018-15721|2024-09-17T02:26:25.523Z -- logitech -- logitech%20harmony%20hub
item.description: The XMPP server in Logitech Harmony Hub before version 4.15.206 is vulnerable to authentication bypass via a crafted XMPP request. Remote attackers can use this vulnerability to gain access to the local API.

item.title: CVE-2018-15722|2024-09-17T02:42:06.972Z -- logitech -- logitech%20harmony%20hub
item.description: The Logitech Harmony Hub before version 4.15.206 is vulnerable to OS command injection via the time update request. A remote server or man in the middle can inject OS commands with a properly formatted response.

item.title: CVE-2018-15723|2024-09-17T02:10:50.517Z -- logitech -- logitech%20harmony%20hub
item.description: The Logitech Harmony Hub before version 4.15.206 is vulnerable to application level command injection via crafted HTTP request. An unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute application defined commands (e.g. harmony.system?systeminfo).

item.title: CVE-2024-8258|2024-09-10T08:36:34.326Z -- logitech -- logitech%20options%20plus
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') in Electron Fuses in Logitech Options Plus version 1.60.496306 on macOS allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via insecure Electron Fuses configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-8011|2024-08-25T11:44:45.839Z -- logitech -- options%2B
item.description: Logitech Options+ on MacOS prior 1.72 allows a local attacker to inject dynamic library within Options+ runtime and abuse permissions granted by the user to Options+ such as Camera.

item.title: CVE-2024-4031|2024-06-04T17:55:35.778Z -- logitech -- mevo%20webcam%20app
item.description: Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in Logitech MEVO WEBCAM APP on Windows allows Local Execution of Code.

item.title: CVE-2024-4031|2024-08-01T20:26:57.253Z -- logitech -- mevo%20webcam%20app
item.description: Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in Logitech MEVO WEBCAM APP on Windows allows Local Execution of Code.

item.title: CVE-2024-8011|2024-08-26T15:28:33.495Z -- logitech -- options%2B
item.description: Logitech Options+ on MacOS prior 1.72 allows a local attacker to inject dynamic library within Options+ runtime and abuse permissions granted by the user to Options+ such as Camera.

item.title: CVE-2024-8258|2024-09-10T13:56:50.325Z -- logitech -- logitech%20options%20plus
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') in Electron Fuses in Logitech Options Plus version 1.60.496306 on macOS allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via insecure Electron Fuses configuration.
